front.title: Heroic Sacrifice
front.gametext: If you just forfeited a Rebel of ability > 2 from a battle at a battleground, deploy on that location; place that Rebel out of play and retrieve 2 Force for each Heroic Sacrifice on table. Immediate Effect canceled if opponent controls this location. (Immune to Control.)
front.lore: The Alliance lost many fine soldiers at conflicts such as the Battle of Hoth. The Rebel High Command is aware of the cost of freedom from Imperial tyranny.

pulledBy: Don't Do That Again - Defensive Shield
